body.bibl: Aydin, Polycarpus Augin. “Qlido D-Leshono – Key of Language: A Comprehensive Syriac Lexicon by Abbot Yuyakim of Tur Islo.” In From Ancient Manuscripts to Modern Dictionaries: Select Studies in Aramaic, Hebrew, and Greek, edited by Tarsee Li and Keith Dyer, 173–78.
